name: The Dark Castle (taiix)
description:
You control 2 characters, if you want to swap the characters use 'Tab'.

To complete the game, you should play clever and use the characters wisely. They should help each other, otherwise, you are doomed to rot in this castle.

The blue character is scared of the darkness but can jump higher.

The red character can't stand on a light.

COLLECT EVERYTHING YOU CAN
